author: Ricardo Rocha
comment: Apart from my general disappointment with Android Wear this watch face is quite good and sharp opposed to most out there where they get all pixalated when set.. Worth the price so far!

author: Lech Deregowski
comment: There are no options to change the colors or settings on the watch and it dumps an unnecessary entry into your app drawer.
title: Looks good but…

author: Kevin McKay
comment: Simple, easy to read, and very sharp looking. A small battery level indicator would be ideal, but even without that this is my favorite watch face on a Moto 360.
title: Favorite watch face

author: Jack Ditty
comment: Great easy to read face would be 100% if I could get rid of the second hand and make the design full screen
title: Very good but

author: Nexjuz On
comment: Did not appear on android wear app. Also not appear on my watch. Using lg g watch

author: SavageCabbage
comment: My favorite watch face! The only downside is that there is no option to show the date on the watch face.

author: Michael Hartman
comment: Love how minimal it is. Looks great on a square face too

author: John Markert
comment: This little thing not only looks great but also is brilliant to quickly read time on a bike or while running.
title: Simple yet ergonomic and stylish.

author: Will James
comment: I love this watch face, New android wear update lets you edit colour and 24hr clock so makes it look like you can tell the time properly!
title: Love it

author: Josh Woolard
comment: I'll change my rating once a square variant is added.  It's a shame that devs disregard this when designing these.

reply.author: The Design Cycle
reply.content:
Hi Josh, 
The new update (1.4) is now optimized for square devices. 
Your feedback has helped us improve our product - much appreciated!

title: Square left out, once again

author: Enrique Jimenez
comment: full screen use of square watch would be better tho.
title: looks good!

author: Bryan Skene
comment: Looks awesome but the font has some pixelation issues.  Maybe switch to a heavier weight of the font your using
title: Great look but...

author: Don C
comment: Would be better with a color wheel.  I gotta stick with red because all the other colors are not to my liking.
title: Needs more colors.

author: vishnu Galiveeti
comment: need to think of using different faces while using idle time. High contrast eats battery.
title: Nice face

author: Kwame Govine
comment: Knocked out of the park, I love it keep them up.!
title: So sweet! Another home run
